title: A JavaScript developer's guide to Rails: What is Polymorphic Rails Model?
partialText: Learn how Rails polymorphic associations work under the hood, from database schema to model setup, with clear examples for JavaScript developers new to ActiveRecord.

title: Claude Code: Production ready code in a two-week sprint
partialText: AI-generated code doesn't have to be throwaway code. Here's how we used Claude Code to build a fully-tested, production-quality Rails prototype in two weeks, complete with a robust test suite, clean commits, and code we were proud to have written.
